Wisdom: لَا تَزِلُّوا عَنِ الْحَقِّ وَأَهْلِهِ فَإِنَّهُ مَنِ اسْتَبْدَلَ بِنَا أَهْلَ الْبَيْتِ هَلَكَ وَفَاتَتْهُ الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةُ
enWisdom: Do not stray from the truth and its people, for verily whoever opts [to follow] other than us, the household [of the Prophet], perishes and loses in [both] this world and the Hereafter

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا النَّاسُ رَجُلَانِ مُتَّبِعٌ شِرْعَةً وَمُبْتَدِعٌ بِدْعَةً
enWisdom: People are only [one of] of two types: the follower of [divine] law or the innovator of an innovation
